title: My son and his girl friend live on S. fourth.Orange/by St marys school, their apartment was the subject to a breakin. I show no report on the newsreporter, he was out of town and cops were called where can I find this report?
text:
Could this be the break-in you were asking about?



B&e Felony/ Non-forc/larceny/no Larceny - WPD

Case #: 2011013883

12:35 AM Mar. 23, 2011

207 S 4th St



If not, it could be that the report hasn't been filed yet.
